body: Please make a series of movie like mcu. LoL community definitely gonna love it. ðŸ’•

replies.body: Ayyyy that'd be pretty baller! We've got *some* videos up on the universe site like Amumu's and Jinx's, but a full-blown theatrical experience would be pretty epic. What kind of story do you think they should do?
anything hehe. Anything in lol is awesome.
